attributes.action: Consider spending £369m on affordable housing rather than Buckingham Palace.
attributes.additional_details:
links to articles

Buckingham Palace to get £369m refurbishment http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-38025513

Affordable home building dips to 24-year low http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-38015368

please also sign this petition I found while creating this one

https://you.38degrees.org.uk/petitions/make-royals-pay-for-palace-renovation?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=post&utm_campaign=18_11_2016_breakingnews&bucket=facebook-post-18_11_2016_breakingnews
attributes.background: If my boiler breaks I pay for it, so if the Queens boiler breaks she should pay for it. Affordable housing is a bit of an oxymoron, I know very few people who can afford a deposit for a mortgage. Lets change this and get some houses built that working class people can afford.
